meanings.definition: The quality or state of being decorative.
meanings.sent1: The decorativenesses of the room was evident in the colorful paintings on the walls.
meanings.sent2: She added a touch of decorativenesses to the party by hanging fairy lights around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The decorativenesses of the cake was so over the top that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit had a level of decorativenesses that made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The decorativenesses of the garden was so enchanting that it felt like stepping into a fairytale.

meanings.definition: The ability to enhance the appearance of something through ornamentation.
meanings.sent1: The decorativenesses of the vase was enhanced by the intricate patterns etched into its surface.
meanings.sent2: She used her artistic skills to bring decorativenesses to the plain walls of the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The decorativenesses of the costume made everyone at the party smile with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds when it came to adding decorativenesses to everyday objects.
meanings.sent5: The decorativenesses of the table setting transformed the dining room into a festive space.
